level.heading: Undertaking to abide judgment of the court.
level.text: At the time of filing a complaint in replevin, the plaintiff shall enter into an undertaking by himself or his agent with surety, approved by the clerk, to abide by and perform the judgment of the court.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Bonds and undertakings, see ยง 28-2501 et seq.
